title: Add a crisp or contrasting texture
description: If a recipe is dominated by soft/creamy textures, suggest a crisp element (toasted nuts, crispy shallots, breadcrumbs, quick-fried herbs).
suggestionTemplate: Add a crunchy finishing element (toasted nuts, fried shallots, or a breadcrumb crunch) to provide texture contrast.

examples.note: Add toasted pepitas and chili oil drizzle.
